definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: lay aside, leave, save (NH [[גׇּרַם]] is shorten, occasion, bring about, to pass, Aram. [[גְּרַם]] Pa. occasion, bring about, gram abscidit, decrevit, cf. also Ar. jarama cut off (fruit), shear (sheep);—on connexion of ideas v. Fl NHWB:i. 437)

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[לאׁ גׇֽרְמוּ לַבּׂקֶר]] Zep 3:3 they have left nothing for the morrow, in fig. of cruel judges (dub.: al. fr. II. [[[גׇּרַם]]], v. Kau:AT Dr).
